articles.title: National Meeting Marks Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday to mark the 47th anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, made a report.
					
					 Kim Jong Il started his work at the WPK Central Committee on June 19, Juche 53 (1964), reflecting the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung and the unanimous will and desire of the party, army and people, the reporter said, and continued:
					
					 In the early period of his work at the WPK Central Committee, Kim Jong Il established a firm ideological and leadership system of the President throughout the party.
					
					 He made sure that revolution and construction were conducted as intended by the President and the way he did, enabling the WPK to firmly preserve its revolutionary character as a party of the President and opening a sacred history of accomplishing the cause of perpetuating his memory on this land.
					
					 He formulated the Songun politics in the 1990s as a main political mode under socialism and a revolutionary leadership mode of the WPK, further strengthening it. This is of really weighty significance in the history of its construction.
					
					 The reporter went on:
					
					 The military parade and other celebrations of the 65th birthday of the WPK in the last significant year were a striking demonstration of his outstanding leadership ability as he explored the unique way of party building by organically combining politics with military affairs, party with the army.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are dashing ahead at the speed of Songun Korea, a new Chollima speed, towards the eminence of a thriving socialist nation with the immutable truth that the decision of Kim Jong Il, the decision of the WPK, leads to gigantic practice. 
					
					 The reporter underscored the need to firmly preserve and defend the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il has performed while leading the party for nearly five decades and conduct the party building and activities strictly on the basis of ideas and theories and methods of Kim Jong Il and thus develop the WPK into the eternal party of the President.
					
					 He called for further increasing the politico-ideological and military and technological might of the People's Army, completing the work to put all people under arms and turn the whole country into a fortress on a higher level, safeguarding the country as firm as an iron wall through the concerted efforts of the army and people and dynamically pushing forward socialist construction.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never pardon the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who drove the north-south relations into an uncontrollable phase, launch a nation-wide all-out offensive to put an end to its anti-DPRK confrontation moves and achieve the historic cause of national reunification without fail.
					
					 The DPRK will boost friendly and cooperative relations with the countries friendly to it in the idea of independence, peace and friendship and make positive efforts to achieve world peace and realize the independence of humankind, he concluded.
					
					 It was attended by senior party, state and army officials, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, labor innovators and working people.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Queen of UK
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Queen of UK
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Elizabeth II, queen of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
					 Kim in the message wished her happiness in good health and the people of UK prosperity on her official birthday (national day).

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Germany Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Germany Appointed
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Ri Si Hong was appointed DPRK ambassador to Germany, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for France to Attend Intl' Meeting
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for France to Attend Intl' Meeting
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea headed by Vice-Chairman of its Central Committee Kil Sang Bong left here on Saturday to attend the 3rd congress of the International Union of Agricultural and Foodstuff Workers to be held in France.

articles.title: Crewmen of Different Countries Mark Significant Day of DPRK
articles.content:
Crewmen of Different Countries Mark Significant Day of DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Crewmen of different countries met at Chongjin Port of the DPRK Saturday to celebrate the 47th anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They were captains and crewmen of a Hong Kong ship of China and a Panamanian-flagged ship.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting referred to the signal contributions made by Kim Jong Il to the strengthening of the WPK and accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Songun over the past 47 years.
					
					 They said that under his leadership the WPK has played a big role in making enormous achievements in the revolution and construction.
					
					 His recent visit to China was a historic event that put the traditional relations of friendship between the two countries on a new level, they said, adding that the WPK led by him will always display its dignity as an invincible party.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Prior to the meeting its participants watched Korean film "Pyongyang Today".

articles.title: Day of Persons with Disabilities Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Day of Persons with Disabilities Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- An event took place at Songchon Deaf and Dumb School in South Phyongan Province on Saturday, the Day of Persons with Disabilities in the DPRK.
					 Present at the event were officials of the C.C., the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled and the South Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, school teachers, pupils and their parents.
					
					 Schoolchildren enjoyed amusements after mass rhythmic gymnastics.
					
					 School things and living necessities were conveyed to them.
					
					Such events have been held in provinces, cities and counties throughout the country.
					
					 The DPRK government pursues a policy of respecting the personality of the disabled and ensuring their socio-political rights and interests equal to other citizens.

articles.title: Military Families Give Performance before Full Houses
articles.content:
Military Families Give Performance before Full Houses
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Families of servicepersons of the Korean People's Army are giving performances at Ponghwa Art Theatre before full houses. They are attending the fourth second-term contest of art groups of military families. 
					 Colorful numbers included immortal masterpiece "Nostalgia", "Glory to Our Great Party" and "My Country Blooms Thanks to General".
					
					 "Let's Bring into Bloom Soldiers' Life", "Our Daughter-in-Law" and "We Did It" deeply impressed the audience.
					
					 The audience applauded the performers who reflected the ideological and moral traits of the families full of faith in sure victory and revolutionary optimism and the might of revolutionary soldier culture and art encouraging the army and people to building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Guidelines for Revolutionary Party Building
articles.content:
Guidelines for Revolutionary Party Building
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- June 19 marks the 47th anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il's beginning of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 On this occasion, the Korean people are recollecting the great feats the leader has performed in developing the Juche-based theory of party building.
					
					 With a deep insight into the cause of the ruling parties' collapse in socialist countries in the late 1980s-early 1990s, he published a celebrated work "On the Fundamentals in Revolutionary Party Building" in October Juche 81 (1992).
					
					 The work points out that the parties' collapse in some socialist countries and their return to capitalism is viewed as an abnormal, transient development in the light of the general trend of human history. It attributes the collapse to the parties that failed to carry on party building and party activities in a proper way.
					
					 The work also gives a clear explanation of theoretical and practical matters concerning revolutionary party building, including the continuity of leadership and development of the party on a mass basis. 
					
					 The guidelines for revolutionary party building provided by the work has encouraged the revolutionary parties and the people over the world to defend and advance the popular masses' cause of independence, the cause of socialism.

articles.title: Food Culture Develops in DPRK
articles.content:
Food Culture Develops in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Food culture is now in full bloom in the DPRK with more catering centers appearing in Pyongyang and localities which help lay a solid foundation for its development.
					 Okryu Restaurant turned into a national food and specialties center with sturgeon aquaria and turtle breeding ground. The specialties hall of the restaurant which opened its door last November serves sturgeon, quail and other dishes together with peculiar national dishes.
					
					 Chongryu Restaurant has been renovated in formative and artistic ways. Fully equipped with the latest facilities the restaurant has become another excellent service center for the people.
					
					 Other popular public catering centers have also been renovated. They include Ryonmot Restaurant, Pyongyang Noodle Restaurant, Hot Rice Restaurant in Kumsong Street, Chilgol Folk Restaurant, Pyongyang Catfish Soup Restaurant.
					
					 A glutinous rice-cake house and pancake bar and raw liquor bar appeared in Folk Street in Sariwon City. Lots of national food restaurants and eateries can also be seen in provincial, city and county seats in South Phyongan, South Hamgyong and Ryanggang provinces.
					
					 The Korean Association of Cooks and the General Bureau for Service for People have worked hard to find out more traditional national food and local dishes and put their cuisines on scientific and standardized basis.
					
					 Annual food festival of diverse forms and methods and specialty exhibition, national dishes exhibition, technical workshop and sampling parties also promote the development of the food culture.
					
					 At the 16th April Holiday Food Festival this year, over 1,000 national dishes including mung bean and potato dishes drew attention of the participants. 
					
					 Some restaurants serve world famous dishes including ostrich and eel dishes, pizza, spaghetti, hamburger, fried catfish with fruit sauce.

articles.title: DPRK Advances with Might of Ideology
articles.content:
DPRK Advances with Might of Ideology
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- general secretary Kim Jong Il published a famous work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential For Accomplishing Socialism" on June 19, Juche 84 (1995).
					 The work contains theories of the significance and importance of working-class party's ideological work in accomplishing the cause of socialism, and its essence, duty, content and method.
					
					 Since the work was published, the ideological education has been invigorated in the country under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Ideological education is conducted through explanation, visual aids, visit to revolutionary battle sites and historic places and artistic activities.
					
					 Art performances of the State Merited Chorus, army units, servicemen's families, and educational and industrial establishments are often telecast, encouraging the Korean people to perform feats in the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: Italian Party Official Praises WPK
articles.content:
Italian Party Official Praises WPK
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is displaying its dignity as the powerful party that enjoys absolute support and trust from the masses of people, said Alfonso Galdi, director of the International Department of the Leftwing People's Party of Communists of Italy, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 During the stay in the DPRK, he was surprised to witness its stirring reality, he said in an interview with KCNA on Friday.
					
					 He further said:
					
					 The WPK has made admirable achievements in socialist construction by guiding the people.
					
					 I could feel this fact keenly when touring the e-library of Kim Il Sung University, Party Founding Museum, Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm and other places.
					
					 Under the leadership of the WPK the Korean people will surely build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 The world progressive people desirous of socialism are zealously praising the WPK.
					
					 The Italian party extends full support and solidarity to the just cause of the WPK dynamically advancing towards socialism, he said.

articles.title: Japan's Political Camp Locked in Scramble for Power
articles.content:
Japan's Political Camp Locked in Scramble for Power
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The aggravating political contradiction over the issue of premiership has put the political situation in Japan into mayhem.
					 The three opposition parties including the Liberal Democratic Party jointly submitted a Cabinet non-confidence motion to the House of Representatives recently.
					
					 This happened against the background of the accident at the nuclear power station caused by the massive earthquake and its ensuing tsunami.
					
					 President of the LDP Tanigaki expressed his intention to submit a motion, saying that it serves as the best weapon in the hands of the opposition party holding the regime accountable for the accident. This was joined by other opposition parties.
					
					 Moreover, there began even at the Democratic Party a movement favoring the opposition parties' presentation of the motion.
					
					 What merits attention is that former representative of the DP Ozawa rolled up his sleeves to launch "a campaign for forcing Naoto Kan to step down" though he was subject to the suspension of qualification after being indicted on charges of violation of the law on the regulation on political fund.
					
					 Ozawa invited at least 60 members of the House of Representatives from the DP to a meeting at a hotel in Tokyo Metropolis and asked them to vote for the motion when it is submitted.
					
					 Timed to coincide with this, Ozawa's confidants, three vice-ministers of the Cabinet Office, the Ministry of National Land and Communications and the Ministry of Government Administration and two parliamentary officials tendered their resignations to vote for the motion.
					
					 It is against this backdrop that the motion was put to a vote at the plenary session of the House of Representatives but turned down.
					
					 After the motion was voted down, the true colors of the politicians engrossed in the scramble for power were brought into bolder relief.
					
					 Kan expressed his intention to step down before the voting on the motion, but made a speech totally denying it after it was voted down. This sparked off fresh contradiction and confrontation.
					
					 Voices demanding an early resignation of the prime minister were heard from among members of DP who claimed the "Kan Cabinet is little different from a 'corpse'".
					
					 Advisor to the DP Watanabe at a press conference requested the prime minister to resign as soon as possible and Secretary General of the DP Okada expressed his intention to recommend the prime minister to step down in case he is not willing to resign.
					
					 Opposition parties began examining the issue of submitting a motion calling for impeaching the prime minister to the House of Councilors.
					
					 By taking advantage of the favorable conditions where opposition parties hold an overwhelming majority of members of the House of Councilors, the LDP seeks to make the above-said motion passed at an early date and lead the political situation to the dissolution of the House of Representatives and general election in a bid to come to power again.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Observed in Laos and Bangladesh
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Observed in Laos and Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Laos and Bangladesh carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 A Lao paper edited articles accompanied with portraits of leader Kim Jong Il from May 16 to 31.
					
					 The paper in an article praised Kim Jong Il for performing immortal exploits by strengthening and developing the WPK into invincible vanguard ranks which achieved the unity in thinking and purpose and revolutionary solidarity, centering around President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The paper recalled that Kim Jong Il has ushered in a new era of building a thriving socialist nation under the uplifted banner of Songun and made an immortal contribution to the human cause of independence. 
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Blits on June 10 carried articles entitled "Kim Jong Il, June 19, 1964," etc. accompanied with his portrait and photographs on his revolutionary activities. 
					
					 The paper said in an article titled "The DPRK, Single-minded Unity and Kim Jong Il" said thanks to Kim Jong Il the DPRK's single-minded unity has been consolidated in every way. 
					
					 Noting that under his leadership changes of the century are taking place in the DPRK, the paper stressed that no force on earth can match socialist Korea where all servicepersons and people are united close around him.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries between June 9 and 13 to mark the 47th anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. They included Kimjongilia shows, meetings, DPRK book and photo exhibitions and film shows held in Bangladesh, Pakistan, Germany, Russia, Uganda, South Africa, Malaysia and Singapore.
					 Displayed in the venues were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos on their feats, immortal flower Kimjongilias in full bloom and books and magazines introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Korean films shown included "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation", "Reply of Korea" and "Mt. Chilbo".
					
					 Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, Khaleq Zaman Bhuiyan, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee made it possible for the WPK to develop into an eternal party of Kim Il Sung and a powerful guiding force of the Songun revolution.
					
					 Mohammad Aslam Nagi, secretary general of the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, noted that Kim Jong Il is clearly indicating the way to be followed not only by the Korean people but by the world revolutionary parties and progressive people through his indefatigable and energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 The chairman of the Nider Sachsen State Committee of the Communist Party of Germany who is chief of the Hannover Group for the Study of the Juche Idea praised Kim Jong Il for having performed undying feats for the Korean revolution and global independence for nearly 50 years since he started the work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					  A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting in Germany.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Swedish Party Leader
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Swedish Party Leader
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign party leaders expressed belief that the Workers' Party of Korea would always achieve shining progress under the leadership of Kim Jong Il at the end of their visits to the Party Founding Memorial Tower. 
					 Anders Karlsson, chairman of the Communist Party of Sweden, said:
					
					 The Party Founding Memorial Tower is flawless in architectural art. 
					
					 Its tower, round pedestal and platform comprehensively deal with the history of the WPK. 
					
					 The WPK organizes and guides all the victories of the Korean people.
					
					 The WPK led by Kim Jong Il is displaying its might as an invincible revolutionary party. 
					
					 Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico, gave his expressions of the tower after visiting it as follows:
					
					 My visit to the memorable tower gave me an opportunity to know better about the immortal exploits performed by the peerlessly great persons in party building. 
					
					  The WPK was founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					  Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il the WPK has displayed its might as he has successfully carried out the revolutionary cause of the President. 
					
					 He has frustrated the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK with the Songun politics, firmly protecting the sovereignty of the country. 
					
					 The Korean people have achieved great successes in building a thriving nation, united close around the WPK. 
					
					 The general secretary of the Mongolian People's Party said that the WPK made an ever-victorious history. This was possible thanks to the tested leadership of      Kim Il Sung, founder of the WPK, and Kim Jong Il who has carried forward and accomplished his cause. 
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council and Executive Committee of the Socialist Party of Romania, had this to say:
					
					  The emblem of the WPK depicting a hammer, sickle and writing brush indicates that it is a mass party of the working people. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il has developed and enriched the President's idea of party building. 
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il the WPK is winning victories only.

articles.title: Work Posted on Internet of British Organization
articles.content:
Work Posted on Internet of British Organization
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted general secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" on its Internet homepage on Monday.
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 84 (1995), clarifies the idea that priority should be given to the ideological work to successfully accomplish the socialist cause and the basic mission of this work is to model the whole society on the socialist idea.
					
					 It also stresses that the ideological work should be conducted in line with principles and method meeting the intrinsic requirements of socialism.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Introduced by Bangladeshi Paper
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Introduced by Bangladeshi Paper
The Bangladeshi paper Blits on June 8 carried an article titled "President Kim Il Sung and his birthplace at Mangyongdae".
					 A low thatched house where the President was born is preserved at Mangyongdae of the DPRK in its original state, the article said, and went on:
					
					 After hearing the news that his father was arrested by the Japanese imperialist police again, Kim Il Sung left Mangyongdae at the age of 13 with a firm pledge to retake the country.
					
					 Since then he had waged a hard-fought anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and liberated the country. He returned to his birthplace 20 years later.
					
					 The Korean people have preserved the old home at Mangyongdae as a sacred land of revolution which draws an endless crowd of visitors as the President devoted all his life to the sovereignty and prosperity of the country and its people's well-being.
					
					 The old home is plain and simple but it has become a place dear to all visitors, prominent politicians, officials and people of the world, expressing reverence for the President.

articles.title: Immediate Halt to Construction of Jeju Navy Base Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Immediate Halt to Construction of Jeju Navy Base Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Jeju Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration demanded the puppet authorities stop at once the construction of the Jeju navy base on Wednesday, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 If the navy base is built on Jeju Island, the U.S. forces will regard it as natural to use the base under the south Korea-U.S. "SOFA", the organization charged and continued:
					
					 The frequent call of U.S. warships at Jeju Island would further escalate the military tensions on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It declared it would join all other reunification movement organizations in the actions against the construction of the navy base, a threat to the peace on the peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Environmental Pollution in U.S. Military Base Disclosed by S. Korean
articles.content:
Environmental Pollution in U.S. Military Base Disclosed by S. Korean
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- South Korean KBS on Tuesday obtained and opened to public a report of the U.S. forces on the environmental pollution in the U.S. military base in Waegwan.
					 This report was worked out by the U.S. Far Eastern engineering corps in 1996 after making a wide-ranging investigation on the basis of its 1992 research report about the environmental pollution in the U.S. military bases in south Korea.
					
					 At that time the corps sent underground water from the U.S. military base in Waegwan to research institutes in Texas, U.S., and Japan for analysis. The results of the analysis led to detecting lead 17 times the allowed level in the underground water.
					
					 Carcinogen was found in two wells south of the base.

articles.title: Actions against S. Korean Authorities' Unpopular Education Policy Called  for
articles.content:
Actions against S. Korean Authorities' Unpopular Education Policy Called for
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea at a press conference in Seoul on Tuesday declared actions against the puppet authorities' unpopular education policy.
					 A press release made public at the press conference said that students' actions demanding the "government" implement its  commitment to halve the registration fee are steadily gaining in scope amid the full support of the people.
					
					 There is growing people's resentment at the Lee regime's unpopular education policy, it noted, adding the organization would join the students in their actions for a solution to the registration fee issue and launch an intensive struggle across south Korea from that day.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Hit for Disallowing Event for Reunification Common to Nation
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Hit for Disallowing Event for Reunification Common to Nation 
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The south side delegation to the national rally for peaceful reunification marking the 11th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration held a press conference at Rimjin Pavilion in Phaju, Kyonggi Province on Wednesday at which it denounced the puppet authorities for disallowing the event.
					 A press release read out at the press conference deplored that the rally to be jointly held by the south and the north and overseas could not be held due to the moves of the authorities to torpedo it.
					
					 We cannot but lament over the absurdity and incompetence of the Lee Myung Bak regime which finally opted for confrontation with fellow countrymen, the press release noted, demanding the authorities come to their senses and opt for implementing the joint declaration, though belatedly.
					
					 It urged the authorities to withdraw the "May 24 step" which severed the inter-Korean relations and refrain from escalating the military tensions such as large-scale military exercises in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line and in the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 No matter how desperately the Lee regime may work, the June 15 era of reunification will keep advancing, it stressed.
					
					 The Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference in front of the puppet Ministry of Unification on Tuesday at which it condemned the Lee regime for finally disallowing the rally.

articles.title: Actions for Implementing Joint Declaration Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Implementing Joint Declaration Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea issued a commentary on Wednesday, the 11th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 The joint declaration is a historic one which indicated the ways for the south and the north to put an end to antagonism and confrontation and achieve national reconciliation and peaceful reunification, the commentary said.
					
					 No sooner had the joint declaration been published than it enjoyed absolute support by the whole nation, it noted.
					
					 It hit out at the Lee Myung Bak regime for openly committing anti-DPRK confrontation acts while blocking the implementation of the joint declaration.
					
					 The more desperately the Lee regime tries to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen, the deeper the declaration will be enshrined in the hearts of the people, the commentary said, calling upon the people from all walks of life desirous of peace and reunification to wage a vigorous struggle to implement the joint declaration.

articles.title: Cooperation among Different Countries
articles.content:
Cooperation among Different Countries
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- China and Tanzania on Tuesday agreed to further promote the relations between the two countries' armed forces.
					 On Monday Niger and Mali agreed to secure their common border against the threats of terrorism.

articles.title: Quake Jolts Japan's Northeast Honshu
articles.content:
Quake Jolts Japan's Northeast Honshu
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 5.9 on the Richter scale on Tuesday rocked Japan's northeastern Honshu Island.
					 The quake occurred at a depth of 10 km under the sea bed off the coast of Miyagi Prefecture.

articles.title: Iran Makes Achievements in Electronic Warfare Field
articles.content:
Iran Makes Achievements in Electronic Warfare Field
 Tehran, June 16 (KCNA) -- Iran has made achievements in its efforts to develop the electronic warfare field to cope with the enemies' stratagem.
					 A high-ranking official of the Iranian army recently said that Iran is developing the cutting-edge technology in the electronic warfare field and has made great achievements in all technological aspects to be used in this field.
					
					 Major achievement made by the Iranian army, in particular, is that self-support has been established in fields of communications and IT, he said.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Overseas Compatriots Organization Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Overseas Compatriots Organization Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Federation of South Koreans in Japan for Democracy and Unification issued a statement on June 6 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its unreasonable suppression of an overseas compatriots organization.
					 The Lee regime disallowed the participation of the chairman of the organization in the event of compatriots in Europe marking the 31st anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising in May, the statement recalled.
					
					  Its crackdown on the organization has become more frequent since its appearance. For instance, two years ago agents of the Intelligence Service took the chairman to an interrogation room upon his arrival at Inchon Airport to take part in the meeting marking the April 19 Popular Uprising and questioned him on charges of the violation of the "National Security Law."
					
					 Intolerable is such suppression perpetrated by the regime after labeling the organization an "anti-state organization", it noted.
					
					 What the organization has done is its opposition to the wrong policy of the present south Korean authorities, it said, declaring it would struggle against its unreasonable crackdown.

articles.title: Imperialists Accused of Their Moves to Stamp out National Languages
articles.content:
Imperialists Accused of Their Moves to Stamp out National Languages
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Imperialists' moves to stamp out national languages are very dangerous criminal acts as they are aimed to vandalize the precious mental and cultural wealth accumulated by humankind through long history and adversely affect the independence and unity of each country and nation and their independent development, says DPRK major newspaper Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The moves are little short of acts of aggression without gunfire against other countries and nations and major means for realizing their strategy for world hegemony.
					
					 As the reactionary nature of the globalization advocated by the imperialists was proven by reality, it is the most vicious and craftiest move to exterminate the nation, an attempt to assimilate other people to their citizens and a strategy for hegemony because it is aimed at imposing their view on value and mode upon them, ignoring national boundaries and characters in all fabrics of social life.
					
					 The imperialists are using the exchange and cooperation among countries for national prosperity and development and social progress as an important lever for implementing their hegemonic policy.
					
					 Typical of them is the United States. It enacts acts concerning them and uses exchange and cooperation as levers for its political domination and economic plunder of other countries and stamps out their languages on their strength.
					
					 Imperialists advocate "use of multi-languages", a reactionary theory, and deliberately complicate the language issue in multi-nationality states. By doing so, they spark and stir up conflicts among nations, tribes and religions in a bid to use linguistic contradictions and friction for achieving their purposes of dominating and subjugating other nations.
					
					 They are also pressurizing the homogenous nations to use their languages overtly or covertly in a bid to mar the pure and unique nature of their national languages or deprive them of this nature and precipitate the split of nations and make them heterogeneous.
					
					 For instance, south Korea is prevalent with the use of medley words and the tendency of using foreign words. Being grave consequences entailed by the U.S. imperialists' moves to stamp out national languages, they are depriving the Korean language of its purity and unique nature and seriously affecting the uniform development of the advantageous Korean language.
					
					 This is one of the main factors which perpetuate the division of the Korean nation and facilitate the process of making it heterogeneous, concludes the article.

articles.title: China Has Nothing to Do with Cyberattack on IMF
articles.content:
China Has Nothing to Do with Cyberattack on IMF
 Beijing, June 17 (KCNA) -- China has nothing to do with the recent attack on the International Monetary Fund's website, a spokesman for the Chinese Foreign Ministry said at a press conference on Tuesday.
					 It is groundless to link this ordinary case with the Chinese government, and such attempt is just for other purposes, he said.
					
					 China is one of the victims to cyberattacks, he said, adding it has definite law and regulations for control over cyberattack and will conduct active exchange and cooperation in Internet security with the international community on the basis of equality and mutual benefits.

articles.title: Chinese President Outlines Priorities for SCO's Development
articles.content:
Chinese President Outlines Priorities for SCO's Development
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Chinese President Hu Jintao outlined the priorities for the development of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) in its next decade at its summit on Wednesday.
					 The SCO should strengthen good-neighborliness among its member states, further improve its security cooperation mechanism and enhance its members' interoperability to fight practical threats, Hu said.
					
					 It also should steer the region toward economic integration and give strong impetus to the common development and prosperity across the region, he added.

articles.title: Book Published in China to Mark 90th Anniversary of CPC
articles.content:
Book Published in China to Mark 90th Anniversary of CPC
 Beijing, June 17 (KCNA) -- The Central Documents' Publishing House of China recently published "Selection of Major Documents since the Birth of the Party (1921-1949)" on the occasion of the 90th birthday of the Communist Party of China.
					 The book was edited by the Document Research Office of the CPC Central Committee and the Central Archives of China.
					
					 It contains major documents dating back to different periods from the foundation of the CPC to the birth of new China.

articles.title: Pakistan Wants to Join SCO
articles.content:
Pakistan Wants to Join SCO 
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Pakistan wants to be a full-fledged member of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO), Pakistan President Asif Ali Zardari said in a press conference on Tuesday.
					 "I am convinced that the SCO has great prospects. Pakistan wants to join it and hopes for support from all organization members," Zardari said.

articles.title: Website of U.S. CIA Hacked
articles.content:
Website of U.S. CIA Hacked
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Websites in the United States have recently come under attacks one after another, giving rise to public discussion.
					 The Central Intelligence Agency's website was taken down on Wednesday, according to Japan's Mainichi Shimbun.
					
					 LulzSec, a hacker group, claimed the responsibility for this attack.
					
					 The group had already broken into the Senate's public website.

articles.title: Acto central por el inicio de trabajo de Kim Jong Il en el CC del PTC
articles.content:
Acto central por el inicio de trabajo de Kim Jong Il en el CC del PTC
 Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 18 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 47o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					 Asistieron alli los cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea, los funcionarios de sectores de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion junto con los innovadores laborales y trabajadores.
					
					 El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC.
					
					 El informante senalo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il inicio el 19 de junio del 53 (1964) de la Era Juche su trabajo en el CC del PTC, de acuerdo con el gran proposito del Presidente Kim Il Sung y la unanime voluntad y deseo de todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo.
					
					 Ya en ese periodo el Dirigente establecio en todo el partido el firme sistema de ideologia y de direccion del Presidente, destaco y continuo:
					
					 Al dirigir la revolucion y la construccion segun la voluntad y al estilo del Presidente, el Dirigente ha mantenido con firmeza el caracter revolucionario del PTC como partido de Kim Il Sung y registro en esta tierra una sagrada historia de la causa de eternidad del Lider.
					
					 En la decada de los 90 del siglo pasado, formulo la politica de Songun como el principal modo politico socialista y modo de direccion del PTC sobre la revolucion y fortalecio mas el PTC, lo cual reviste suma importancia en la historia de construccion del PTC.
					
					 Los actos dedicados al 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC incluyendo el desfile militar efectuados en el significado ano pasado manifestaron plenamente la extraordinaria capacidad directiva del Dirigente quien forja el camino de la construccion del partido autoctono combinando de modo organico la politica con los asuntos militares, y el partido con el ejercito.
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea marchan a galopes con la nueva velocidad de Chollima, la de Corea del Songun, hacia la cima del gran Estado prospero socialista, guardando la verdad de que la decision del Dirigente y del partido se pone sin falta en practica.
					
					 Debemos defender con firmeza las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias del  Dirigente alcanzadas en su direccion sobre el PTC durante cerca de 50 anos y promover la construccion y las actividades del partido a base de su ideologia, teoria y metodos para fortalecer el PTC como eterno partido glorioso del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Es preciso fortalecer mas el poderio ideo-politico y tecnico-militar del ejercito popular, perfeccionar en el nivel mas alto el armamento de todo el pueblo y la fortificacion de todo el pais. Ademas, los militares y civiles deben unir sus fuerzas para defender la patria como una muralla de acero e impulsar con vigor la construccion socialista. 
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea no perdonaran jamas a la camarilla del traidor Lee Myung Bak que llevo las relaciones intercoreanas a la crisis irremediable, sino libraran una ofensiva general pannacional para poner fin a sus maniobras conflictivas anti-RPDC y lograr sin falta la causa historica de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					 La RPDC desarrollara, bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad, las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con los paises que la tratan con amabilidad y hara ingentes esfuerzos por lograr la paz del mundo y la independencia de la humanidad.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia exterminio de lengua nacional de imperialistas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia exterminio de lengua nacional de imperialistas
						
 Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ATCC) -- Las maquinaciones de los imperialistas para acabar con la lengua nacional devienen los actos criminales mas peligrosos que destruyen las valiosas riquezas espirituales y culturales logradas historicamente por la humanidad y perjudican la independencia, la unidad y el desarrollo autoctono de cada pais y nacion.
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este sabado y continua.
					
					 La campana de los imperialistas para exterminar la lengua nacional constituye un acto agresivo sin tiroteo contra otros paises y naciones y uno de los medios importantes para realizar su estrategia de dominio del mundo.
					
					 Como se ha probado su caracter reaccionario a traves de la realidad, la "globalizacion" de que hablan los imperialistas es la mas astuta maquinacion para exterminar y asimilar a la nacion y la estrategia dominacionista para lograr su intencion  de dominar todo el mundo al negar las fronteras  y el caracter nacional de cada pais en todos los sectores de la vida social e imponer a todo el mundo su concepto de valor y metodo.
					
					 Los imperialistas utilizan el intercambio y la cooperacion entre los paises por la prosperidad, el desarrollo y el progreso social de la nacion como uno de los medios importantes para ejecutar su politica dominacionista. Por ejemplo, EE.UU. inventa "leyes" referentes a estos y toma el "intercambio" y la "cooperacion" como remedios del dominio politico y saqueo economico a otros paises y un aparato por el exterminio de su lengua  nacional.
					
					 Al preconizar la reaccionaria "teoria de uso comun de multi-lengua", los imperialistas complican intencionalmente el problema linguistico de los estados multinacionales para crear las confrontaciones entre las naciones, tribus y sectas y aprovechan el antagonismo y el desacuerdo linguisticos a dominar y subyugar a otros paises.
					
					  Ellos, al propagar astutamente sus idiomas entre las naciones homogeneas, destruyen la pureza y la homogeneidad de la lengua nacional y  promueven la division y la heterogeneidad de la nacion.
					
					 Por ejemplo, el uso de la lengua hibrida y extranjera que se difunden en la sociedad surcoreana es el resultado de las maquinaciones norteamericanas para exterminar la lengua nacional. 
					
					 Su consecuencia hace desaparecer la pureza y la homogeneidad de la lengua coreana e impedir mucho su desarrollo unificado.
					
					 Esto es uno de los factores principales que hacen fijar la division nacional y acelerar la heterogeneidad de la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Acto de tripulantes extranjeros por efemeride coreana
articles.content:
Acto de tripulantes extranjeros por efemeride coreana
 Chongjin, 18 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar este sabado en el puerto de Chongjin el acto de los capitanes y tripulantes de los barcos de Hong Kong de China y de Panama, dedicado al 47o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					 En el acto los oradores senalaron que durante 47 anos pasados el Dirigente Kim Jong Il hizo gran aporte al fortalecimiento del PTC y al cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Songun.
					
					 Subrayaron que bajo la direccion de Kim Jong Il el PTC ha desempenado gran papel por lograr gigantescos cambios en la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					 Destacaron que la recien visita a China del Dirigente fue un evento historico que ha llevado a la nueva etapa las tradicionales relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises.
					
					 Enfatizaron que bajo la guia del Dirigente el PTC exaltara siempre su poderio como el invencible partido.
					
					 En el acto fue aprobada una carta al Dirigente.
					
					 Antes del acto, los participantes vieron el documental coreano "Pyongyang de hoy".

articles.title: Continua con exito funcion artistica de las familiares de militares
articles.content:
Continua con exito funcion artistica de las familiares de militares
 Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ATCC) -- Continua exitosamente en estos dias en el capitalino Teatro de Arte Ponghwa la funcion de los grupos artisticos de las esposas de oficiales de las unidades participantes en el cuarto concurso del segundo periodo de los mismos grupos del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					 Las participantes presentaron en la escena variadas piezas, incluyendo la cancion acompanada de Oungum (instrumento musical coreano) "Nostalgia", la cancion con acordeon "Gloria a nuestro gran partido" y la cancion en acompanamiento de Kayagum (instrumento musical coreano de cuerdas) "Esta es mi patria que prospera gracias al General".
					
					 El publico quedo profundamente impresionado de las piezas que describieron bien la vida de las esposas de oficiales, tales como el coro con narracion "Mejoraremos los niveles de la vida de los militares", la charla comica "Mi nuera" y el monologo "Fuimos nosotras".
					
					 La funcion demostro sin reservas los rasgos ideo-espirituales de ellas, que llevan una vida combativa con la fe en la victoria y el optimismo revolucionario, y el poderio de la cultura y arte revolucionarias de los militares que estimulan a todo el ejercito y el pueblo a la construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					 Los espectadores aplaudieron fuertemente a las ejecutantes.
